title: Louvre Museum director resigns in wake of brazen October crown jewel heist in Paris
desc: Louvre Museum director Laurence des Cars resigns after months of pressure following the brazen theft of crown jewels, water damage, staff strikes, overcrowding complaints and a suspected ticket fraud scheme.

title: The Foundational Elements for an Optimal Ethiopian Nile Basin Treaty Covering Water Allocation and Basin Management
desc: The Nile Basin Initiative (NBI, 1999) has gone a long way toward advancing this goal but remains unfinished. Read more.

title: New study finds Papua New Guinea children among world's most affected by ear disease
desc: Children in Papua New Guinea have some of the world's highest rates of childhood middle ear infections, a new study has found.

title: MPs openly criticising Andrew reflects shift in tradition
desc: In the Commons, MPs shared their personal experiences of meeting the former prince – all of them were resoundingly negative.

title: Hmm: Spirit Airlines Expects To Emerge From Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Soon
desc: Spirit Airlines claims that it will emerge from Chapter 11 bankruptcy in the coming months, stronger than ever. Is that really realistic?

title: Father of Georgia school shooting suspect described son's aggressive behavior in interview after attack
desc: A state investigator testified Tuesday that Colt Gray's father revealed his 14-year-old son had become aggressive and was in need of mental health counseling in the months leading up to the 2024 deadly rampage at a Georgia high school
